title: Base Event
description: The base schema for all events published to the Redpanda streaming platform, now with a mandatory, tenant-scoped context.

title.description: The human-readable, PascalCase name of the object (e.g., 'UniversalPhysicsState').

description.description: A clear, complete sentence explaining the object's purpose and function within the system.

schema_version.description: The semantic version of this schema definition (e.g., '1.0.0').

event_id.title: Entity ID Field
event_id.description: A reusable definition for a unique entity identifier.

trace_id.title: Entity ID Field
trace_id.description: A reusable definition for a unique entity identifier.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: A canonical definition for an ISO 8601 timestamp with timezone.

tenant_id.description: The tenant this event belongs to. This is a mandatory field for security and performance. System-level events may use a null value.
